articles.title: 4th Meeting of KPA Company Commanders and Political Instructors Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
4th Meeting of KPA Company Commanders and Political Instructors Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army took place in Pyongyang on October 22 and 23.
					The meeting reviewed achievements and experiences gained in strengthening companies in the past and discussed tasks and ways for further strengthening companies, cell of the People's Army and basic combat unit, as required by the idea of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the meeting.
					
					Attending there were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Kim Chang Sop, Choe Pu Il and other leading officials of the armed forces organs, commanding officers of the KPA and company commanders and political instructors, commanding officers and political officials of units at all levels who made devoted themselves to safeguarding the sky, land and sea of the country and strengthening companies.
					
					Kim Jong Un made an opening speech at the meeting.
					
					He stressed that when all the participants strengthen companies, cell and basic combat unit of the People's Army, to repay the party's trust and expectation, the might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu will be highly displayed, and expressed the conviction that the on-going meeting will serve as a historical landmark in arousing the whole army to strengthening companies, before declaring the meeting open, 
					
					KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report.
					
					The reporter said that President Kim Il Sung defined company as the cell of revolutionary armed forces and basic combat unit at a time when he formed the first armed ranks of Juche type in the forest of Mt. Paektu and brought up the fourth company of the 7th regiment of the anti-Japanese guerrillas as an exemplary company, thus setting a brilliant example in strengthening companies.
					
					Kim Il Sung convened the meeting of company commanders and political instructors for the first time in the army-building history on October 11, Juche 62 (1973), attended the meeting and unfolded important guidelines in strengthening companies, an epoch-making event which effected a drastic turn in strengthening KPA companies, the reporter said, and went on:.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il put forth the original idea that strengthening company is a key link and a starting point in strengthening the whole army, brightly indicated orientation and ways for companies to follow at each stage and in each period of developing revolution and worked heart and soul for strengthening companies politically and militarily.
					
					The Juche-oriented idea of the great Generalissimos on strengthening companies and feats they performed by doing so are being successfully carried forward onto a higher stage thanks to the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea of the WPK and energetically led the work to model the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in all aspects with companies as a base, thus opening up a heyday for strengthening the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					Kim Jong Un brought up service personnel to be a-match-for-a hundred brave and stalwart fighters and provided energetic guidance to turn all companies into steel-strong militant ranks having strong discipline and assuming the perfect appearance as the regular armed forces by scrupulously managing the companies.
					
					The reporter referred to the fact that a fundamental turn took place in the ideological and moral traits of the company commanders and political instructors and in their work style and many successes were achieved in the efforts to consolidate the companies through the struggle to firmly preserve and glorify the idea of strengthening the companies set forth by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and their feats.
					
					He called for making sustained great efforts to bolster up the companies in order to accelerate the process of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on a new higher stage and thus develop the KPA into an invincible revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					The speakers said that all the companies of the KPA grew to be the ranks of human bullets and bombs devotedly defending the leader as they share the intention, love and destiny with the supreme commander under his energetic leadership and deep loving care.
					
					They said that they would turn all the companies into the ones of human bullets and bombs devotedly protecting the leader and defending the country full of faith and confidence that they are sure to emerge victorious as they are led by the supreme commander.
					
					Kim Jong Un heard with keen interest all the speeches made by company commanders and political instructors at the meeting. He invited the commander and former political instructor of the Kamnamu (persimmon tree) company there to have a photo taken with them.
					
					He made a historic speech at the meeting.
					
					Highly appreciating the successes made in the work of the companies and lauding those company commanders and political instructors who rendered devoted service for them, he set forth the tasks to be carried out to develop all companies into elite revolutionary ones devotedly defending the WPK Central Committee and the ways to do so.
					
					He underscored need for them to firmly unite around the Party Central Committee to take the lead in overcoming difficulties and trials and fully prepare all the company soldiers politically and ideologically and in military technique. He called for establishing strong discipline in the companies, boosting their appearance as regular units, decisively raising the level of company commanding ability and improving the living conditions and environment of the soldiers.
					
					Noting that the meeting helped him find out jewel-like patriots and unassuming commanders and political instructors who dedicated themselves to strengthening their companies, he said in an excited tone that the Party Central Committee decided to highly praise them.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae read out a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					Kim Jong Un awarded the title of Labor Hero, gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class to Company Commander Kim Sang Il, Company Political Instructor Pak Son Gi, Company Commander Kim Kwang Gum, Captain Min Kwang Hae and Company Commander Sa Song Guk. They performed distinguished feats in bolstering up the KPA by strengthening companies into vanguard devotedly defending the leader, a-match-for-a hundred combat ranks and turning them into homes dear to soldiers, true to the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the leadership of the party.
					
					Kim Jong Un made a closing address.
					
					He said that the meeting would go down in the history of the Juche-based army building as it provided a landmark for the development of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army with the strengthening of companies as a starting point under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					He declared the meeting closed, expressing belief that all participants in the meeting would augment the might of the People's Army in every way, united close around the party, and thus perform their duty in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Joint Performance Given by Moranbong Band, State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Joint Performance Given by Moranbong Band, State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday enjoyed the joint performance given by the Moranbong Band and State Merited Chorus together with the participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the KPA.
					Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il and other leading officials of the armed forces organs.
					
					The performance began with the prologue "We Sing of the Party" in which artistes sang high praises of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the era and the revolution, holding the party's flag of Juche as an invincible banner. 
					
					Put on the stage were colorful numbers including orchestral music and male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army", female chorus "Ode to the Motherland", instrumental music and song "Fly Higher Our Party Flag" and light music and serial songs "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms".
					
					The performers, through Korean-style light music and orchestra, made a solemn and impressive representation of the fact that a rosy future is unfolding for the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					In such numbers as mixed quintet and male chorus ""Happiness of Being under the Care of Respected Supreme Commander", light music "Soldiers Answered" and chorus "Let's Defend Socialism" the artistes successfully represented with dynamic and cheerful melody the sky-high spirit of all the service personnel and people dashing ahead at the new speed of offensive, a-match-for-a-hundred speed in the 21st century under the leadership of the party. 
					
					The performance ended with epilogue "Our Destiny and Future Entrusted to You" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives". 
					
					Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the artistes and audience, congratulating the artistes on their successful performance and expressing expectation and belief that all the company commanders and political instructors would fulfill their duties in developing the Korean People's Army into the powerful elite revolutionary army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with KPA Company Commanders, Political Instructors
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with KPA Company Commanders, Political Instructors
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the KPA on Thursday.
					Present there together with him were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il and other leading officials of the armed forces organs.
					
					Noting the meeting marked a turning landmark in developing the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army with the bolstering up of companies as its starting point under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he warmly congratulated all the company commanders and political instructors on successfully holding the meeting with high political awareness and revolutionary enthusiasm. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					He expressed his expectation and belief that they would turn their companies into those of the powerful elite revolutionary army as desired by the party and fulfil their honorable mission and duty in the work to make their service personnel feel themselves at home there.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Refutes International Financial Body's False Report
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Refutes International Financial Body's False Report
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the release of a report finding fault with the financial system in the DPRK at a recent plenary meeting of the Financial Action Task Force on Money Laundering in Paris:
					The DPRK strongly refutes the above-said report as a sinister attempt of hostile forces to tighten the financial sanctions against the DPRK and a wanton violation of its sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					The contents of the report are based on misinformation contrary to facts and, therefore, it doesn't deserve even a passing note. However, the DPRK can not overlook it as it was released at a time when it is making its sincere efforts to develop cooperative relations with the above-said body.
					
					By origin, the DPRK does not allow such practices as money laundering and financing of terrorism in the light of the nature of its social system.
					
					But the DPRK has done all it can as evidenced by the fact that it conducted negotiations with the body in consideration of the latter's continued requests for cooperation, ratified the international convention on restraining financial support to terrorism and submitted possible relevant data to the body.
					
					Nevertheless, this time the body persistently listed the DPRK as "a target of counter-action," keeping mum about its measures. This proves that the action was prompted by the sinister political attempt of certain forces to tarnish the DPRK's image at any cost and the body is playing into their hands. 
					
					The DPRK holds that if the body is to perform its mission and role as a governmental international financial supervisory institution in name and reality, it should strictly abide by the principle of impartiality and objectivity and it is its invariable stand to develop the cooperative relations with such body.

articles.title: Illegal Entrants into North Handed Over to S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Illegal Entrants into North Handed Over to S. Korean Red Cross
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Red Cross Society handed over six illegal south Korean entrants into the DPRK to the south Korean Red Cross via Panmunjom Friday. 
					They were investigated by a relevant institution of the DPRK. It leniently pardoned them and decided to send them back to the south side to let them reunite with their families from a humanitarian point of view as they honestly admitted and reflected on their crime.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Czech Republic
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to his counterpart of the Czech Republic Jan Kohout on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					The message said that the peoples of the two countries have promoted the bonds of friendship and cooperation in different fields.
					
					It expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow strong.

articles.title: Reception Given by Syrian Charge d'Affaires A.I.
articles.content:
Reception Given by Syrian Charge d'Affaires A.I.
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here, gave a reception at his embassy on Friday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade and chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					Tammam Sulaiman said in a speech that the relations between the two countries are making steady progress under the deep care of the leaderships of the two countries.
					
					He expressed the will to make positive efforts to develop these friendly and cooperative relations in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.
					
					Choe Thae Bok said in a speech: 
					
					The DPRK sets store by the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					The DPRK will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country.

articles.title: Participants in KPA Meeting Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in KPA Meeting Tour Pyongyang
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army (KPA) toured Pyongyang, spending significant days.
					They went round the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Friday.
					
					They paid homage to the statue of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, at the lobby of the museum.
					
					They also laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to victors of the great annals.
					
					The visitors looked round several rooms of the museum, being briefed on the fact that the museum was successfully built under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un as a monument of the era for conveying forever the immortal exploits for war victory and the Songun revolution of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, centre of the education in the victorious tradition.
					
					They also laid flowers on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the martyrs cemetery and paid silent tribute to the fallen heroic soldiers.
					
					They went round the cemetery.
					
					They also visited the Pyongyang Folklore Park.

articles.title: Delegation of French Businessmen Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of French Businessmen Leaves
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The delegation of French businessmen led by Alban Yung, China representative of "Foundation of Victor Segalen", went back on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold Medal
Tehran, October 24 (KCNA) -- The 28th World Military Men's Wrestling Championship is under way in Iran.
					The championship started on October 23, bringing together at least 100 players from 18 countries including the DPRK, China, Iran, Pakistan and Kazakhstan.
					
					DPRK wrestler Yun Won Chol in the greco-roman 55 kg category defeated his Chinese rival 8:0 in 1 min. and 30 sec. of the first round in the preliminary match, his Kazakh rival 6:1 in the first round of the quarter finals and his Pakistani rival 7:0 in the first round of the semifinals.
					
					He trounced the Iranian player 7:0 in the first round of the finals by displaying high technique in strong spirit and bagged a gold medal.
					
					The championship continues.

articles.title: Mirim Riding Club Goes Operational
articles.content:
Mirim Riding Club Goes Operational
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Mirim Riding Club, a monumental edifice, was successfully built in Mirim area in the suburbs of Pyongyang to go operational.
					The club is a comprehensive and modern riding service center conducive to the physical training of people including school youth and children.
					
					It is equipped with all conditions and environment necessary for riding and education such as riding courses, riding training halls, room for dissemination of riding knowledge, rest house, veterinary hospital and breeding research institute.
					
					Its opening ceremony took place Friday.
					
					Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok and commanding officers of the units which took part in the construction, officials of ministries and national institutions, soldier-builders, people from all walks of life, youth and students, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of foreign countries, representatives of international bodies, military attaches and their spouses, staff members of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					Korean People's Army Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, addressed the ceremony.
					
					The speaker said that the club is a product of the energetic leadership provided by Marshal Kim Jong Un with devoted service for the people and the heroic efforts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are immensely loyal to the cause of the party.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok and commanding officers of the units which took part in the construction held the tape for opening.
					
					Representatives of the KPA, students, young workers and secondary schoolers in riding uniforms, who will be users of the club, cut the tape.
					
					The participants went round the club.

articles.title: Housewives' Stockbreeding Unit in Chongjin of DPRK
articles.content:
Housewives' Stockbreeding Unit in Chongjin of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- In Chongjin City, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, there is the Phohang District Housewives' Stockbreeding Management Board, which has been well known in the country.
					After its birth in January Juche 71 (1982), the Board has supplied tens of thousands of tons of meat to inhabitants and workers at Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, Musan Mining Complex and other industrial establishments.
					
					A large quantity of pork has been produced this year, too. 
					
					Chairwoman Jo Ok Hui, a winner of the title of Labor Hero, and members of the Board have made all efforts for the prosperity and development of the country with a strong sense of patriotism.
					
					Thanks to their devoted efforts, the Board developed into a big livestock producer with an orderly breeding system.
					
					It has rooms for scientific and technical knowledge and cultural house, feed and breed warehouses, two breeding pig blocks and chicken, duck, and goose houses, all built with its own efforts.
					
					It also cultivated more than ten hectares of fields and built a feed processing base to solve the feed problem, while introducing good breeds of high productivity and advanced stock-raising method and techniques and establishing a strict anti-epidemic system.
					
					The Board is now visited by many people who want to learn from its experience.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Deals with Comradely Friendship between DPRK, China
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Deals with Comradely Friendship between DPRK, China
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries an article to mark the 63rd anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) into the Korean front.
					The CPV's entry into the Korean front, an example of noble internationalism, was disinterested aid of the class brothers and comrades-in-arms based on the revolutionary obligation and an expression of close friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and China, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The history of the steadily developing DPRK-China friendship is associated with the feats performed by the CPV fighters by displaying matchless heroism and self-sacrificing spirit in the Korean front under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					In 1950 the CPV fighters, in response to the call of Chairman Mao Zedong, entered the Korean front without hesitation to help the Korean people in their decisive battles against the U.S. imperialists. Their precious soul is imbued in all parts of the DPRK.
					
					The Chinese people's resisting America and aiding Korea showed that the DPRK-China friendship established in the hard-fought battles for realizing the noble idea and cause is solid and immutable.
					
					A series of changes have taken place in international relations with the passage of time but the friendly relations between the two countries have continued. 
					
					The invincible DPRK-China friendship based on the close friendship and trust between the two peoples is steadily developing thanks to the deep concern and energetic activities of the leaders of the two countries.
					
					It is the duty and noble mission common to the two peoples to consolidate the historical roots of the DPRK-China friendship and carry forward the tradition of unity and obligation in which they have shared the life and death in hard time.
					
					No matter how the times and international relations may change, the DPRK will make all efforts to promote the development of the DPRK-China friendship, a legacy bequeathed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Moves to Disturb Investigation into IS's Case under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Moves to Disturb Investigation into IS's Case under Fire
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Tuesday editorially slammed the puppet regime for disturbing the investigation into the Intelligence Service (IS).
					The editorial referred to the fact that Yun Sok Yol, chief of the Ryoju branch office of the Suwon District Prosecutor's Office, disclosed on Monday that there was outside pressure on the investigation into the IS's case.
					
					The editorial went on:
					
					Jo Yong Gon, chief of the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office, opposed the view of the special investigation team on conducting an operation to arrest and search the IS personnel involved in the illegal interference in the election, afraid that the operation would help the opposition parties and they would  use it for their  political purpose. It is clear that this is not an individual's opposition.
					
					It is not a secret that Chongwadae is derailing the investigation into the IS's case.
					
					Park Geun Hye alleged that she did not get any help from the IS during the "presidential election" but one cannot but question her why she is disturbing the investigation into the case so persistently.
					
					If what Park said were true, she should have encouraged the investigation into the IS's case and establish discipline within it, taking this opportunity.
					
					Park, however, has persistently behaved quite contrary to this.
					
					Truth can never be covered up.
					
					She let the IS, the Defense Ministry and other power organs interfere in the election and fired the chiefs for investigation in a bid to disturb the investigation into it and hide the truth. Such practices put former American President Nixon into the shade.
					
					Whenever Park and Chongwadae found themselves in a predicament, they insisted they did nothing wrong, keeping silence, and cooked up cases to weather their crisis. Are they going to do the same?

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Rapped for Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Rapped for Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- October 26 is the day when the south Korean "yusin regime" met a disgraceful end.
					The National Reunification Institute Friday released a white paper laying bare how the "yusin" dictatorship is being revived in south Korea by the puppet Intelligence Service and what extent it has reached.
					
					The IS appears as a dictatorial ruling power and general headquarters of the fascist rule like the Central Intelligence Agency during the former "yusin" dictatorship regime, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					Styling itself the "vanguard of the president", it is exercising supreme power, holding sway over the "presidential election", "National Assembly", political parties, administration, courts, prosecution, domestic and foreign policies and personnel affairs.
					
					The case of the IS's interference in the election, a serious problem in south Korea, vividly shows what extent the arbitrary practices of the IS have reached.
					
					The IS left no stone untried to block the advance of the candidates from the opposition parties and get the candidate from the "Saenuri Party" elected during the "presidential election" last year.
					
					When voices calling for reform and disbandment of the IS grew stronger in south Korea, it came out with its own "proposal for reform", challenging them by increasing its function of gathering domestic and foreign information and the right to investigation. It was zealously patronized by Park Geun Hye.
					
					Owing to the IS's outrageous interference in politics, it has turned into a lawless land where agents of the IS are riding roughshod as what happened in the past period of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					The IS is harshly cracking down on people of all social standings aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification by labeling them "forces following the north".
					
					The IS agents label  progressive political parties and figures, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Teachers Union and so on "enemy in south Korea" and "forces following the north" and keep strict watch on their every movement. They punish them on charges of espionage.
					
					A typical example of this is the case of Ri Sok Gi's attempted rebellion.
					
					The fascist junta arrested Ri and others of the Unified Progressive Party and participants in a lecture on charges of "attempted rebellion", "sedition", "formation of anti-state organization", "activities of anti-state organization", "praise and sympathy with the north," etc.
					
					The hooligans of the IS stormed the "National Assembly" building and searched the office of a serving "NA" member and took away him on the spot, unprecedented in the history.
					
					Not content with it, the IS is now hatching a plot to disband the Unified Progressive Party on charges of plotted rebellion in alignment with the puppet Ministry of Justice and the "Saenuri Party".
					
					The suppression by the puppet forces left the teachers' union on the verge of forceful disbandment.
					
					The IS coteries brand progressive internet websites as "those following the north" and their just media activities as "propaganda following the north", and raise a hue and cry as if "liberal democratic system" is collapsing.
					
					The IS's suppression of media put progressive internet paper Jaju Minbo on the verge of shutdown.
					
					The IS's anti-DPRK smear campaign and confrontational moves put into the shade what was done by the puppet CIA in the period of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					Its opening to the public of the minutes of the 2007 north-south summit talks after cooking up fabrication proves that its confrontation moves have reached a reckless phase.
					
					It has taken every opportunity to pull up the working talks between authorities of the north and the south for the normalization of the operations in the Kaesong Industrial Zone which were provided by the efforts taken by the DPRK on its own initiative.
					
					The talks for the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the reunions of separated families and relatives which were high on the agenda broke down due to the obstructive moves of the puppet forces including the IS.
					
					The IS has become all the more undisguised in its moves for abduction of DPRK citizens, plots, terrorism, subversive activities and sabotage against it.
					
					Now operational in the third country bordering the DPRK in the northern area are lots of IS agents disguised as missionaries and businessmen.
					
					By spreading anti-DPRK rumors which they cooked up through all sorts of fraud and concoction, the IS coteries viciously slander the DPRK by using despicable human scum.
					
					All facts prove that the IS is the den of all evils which brings the whirlwind of fascism and confrontation and that it will be impossible to realize genuine democracy of south Korean society and the improvement of the north-south relations as long as the rascals left intact.
					
					The existence of the IS brings nothing profitable to any one and becomes the root cause of misfortunes. 
					
					The tragic end of the "yusin" dictator 34 years ago proves it.
					
					The IS should not just be reformed but be disbanded at once.

articles.title: S. Korean District Prosecutor's Office's Crackdown upon Progressives
articles.content:
S. Korean District Prosecutor's Office's Crackdown upon Progressives
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Jonju District Prosecutor's Office Thursday arrested and indicted the former chairman for unification of the North Jolla Provincial branch of the Teachers Union on charges of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law".
					The fascist prosecution claimed that the chairman continuously posted articles praising and sympathizing with the DPRK on website and had "literature profiting the enemy". It also said that it would cooperate with the Intelligence Service, police and other relevant organs to strictly deal with his doing.
					
					The south Korean puppet forces have made desperate efforts to obliterate the Teachers Union, while getting hell-bent on the crackdown upon the progressive forces.

articles.title: WPK Carries Forward DIU Tradition: Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
WPK Carries Forward DIU Tradition: Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "87th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU)" on its website on October 17.
					The article said:
					
					October 17 marks the 87th anniversary of the DIU formed by President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					Since the DIU was formed, the Korean people could advance along the road of independent development with a clear goal and strategy, being responsible for history and their own destiny.
					
					Nearly ninety years of the Korean revolution are a proud history in which it has advanced under the banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					To advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism is the consistent strategy of the Korean revolution and the Korean army and people are carrying forward the tradition of the DIU without any change.
					
					Today the Korean army and people are making a new history of Songun Korea under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Victory and glory are in store for the Workers' Party of Korea carrying forward the great tradition of the DIU, guided by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by Ugandan Organization
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by Ugandan Organization
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement issued a statement on October 18 in support of the October 4 declaration adopted by the north and the south of Korea and the recent statements of the spokesmen for the National Defence Commission and Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					In the statement the Ugandan committee said:
					
					We deem it our duty to support the Korean people's struggle for achieving the country's full sovereignty and independence and the nation's reunification.
					
					The division, confrontation and tension have persisted on the Korean Peninsula due to the imperialists' moves.
					
					We urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to immediately stop obstructing the confidence building between the north and the south of Korea and the Korean nation's reunification and respect the north-south joint declarations.
					
					The U.S. should properly understand that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula means that of the whole of the Korean Peninsula including south Korea, complete removal of the U.S. nuclear threat toward the DPRK and part of the world denuclearization. It should also respond to the just demand of the DPRK for resuming the dialogue without precondition.
					
					We earnestly appeal to the world public to fully support the efforts to implement the October 4 declaration for achieving the prosperity and reunification of the country by the Korean nation itself and ensuring durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Munsu Water Park Introduced by Vietnamese News Service
articles.content:
Munsu Water Park Introduced by Vietnamese News Service
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Vietnamese internet news service VN Express on October 18 introduced the Munsu Water Park illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					It said:
					
					The Munsu Water Park built in Pyongyang started its service.
					
					The modern park covering 109 000 square meters consists of outdoor and indoor wading pools.
					
					Kim Jong Un visited the construction site of the park several times and indicated the tasks and ways for accelerating the project.
					
					Soldiers of the Korean People's Army undertook the project.
					
					The wonderful park, rare to be seen in the world, is a pride of the Korean people.
					
					A lot of modern edifices have appeared in the DPRK in recent years.
					
					The project of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground will be completed before long.
					
					The news service posted pictures introducing the park.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige conferencia de jefes e instructores politicos de companias del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige conferencia de jefes e instructores politicos de companias del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 22 al 23 en esta capital la 4a conferencia de jefes e instructores politicos de las companias del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El foro hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en el pasado en el fortalecimiento de las companias y discutio las tareas y remedios para consolidar las companias, celulas y unidades principales de combate del EPC conforme a la demanda de la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, dirigio el conclave.
					
					Estuvieron presentes aqui Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Kim Chang Sop, Choe Pu Il y otros cuadros directivos de las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, los comandantes del EPC, los jefes e instructores politicos de las companias, quienes han trabajado con abnegacion para fortalecer sus unidades defendiendo el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la patria, los comandantes y funcionarios politicos de las unidades a todos niveles.
					
					El Mariscal pronuncio el discurso inaugural.
					
					El destaco que se pondra de pleno manifiesto el poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu cuando todos los participantes en el conclave fortalezcan sus companias, celulas y unidades principales de combate del EPC, correspondiendo a la confianza y la esperanza del partido.
					
					Declaro inaugurada la conferencia expresando la conviccion de que esta reunion marcara un hito historico para llamar a todo el ejercito al fortalecimiento de las companias.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					Cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo en la selva del Paektu las primeras filas armadas de tipo jucheano, el definio la compania como celula y unidad principal de combate de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y creo el paradigma de fortalecimiento de ella tomando como ejemplar la compania no.4 del septimo regimiento del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, comenzo el informante y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente convoco el 11 de octubre del 62 (1973) de la Era Juche por primera vez en la historia de construccion del ejercito, la conferencia de los jefes e instructores politicos de las companias y asistio a la misma presentando el gran programa del fortalecimiento de esas unidades.
					
					Esto fue un evento trascendental que imprimio viraje revolucionario en el fortalecimiento de las companias del EPC.
					
					Hace mucho tiempo, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il presento la idea original de que esa labor es un eslabon importante y el punto de partida del fortalecimiento de todo el ejercito e ilumino el rumbo y remedios a cumplir por las companias en cada periodo y cada etapa de desarrollo de la revolucion.
					
					Igualmente, realizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales por hacer fuertes las companias en lo politico-militar. 
					
					Destaco que gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal, la autoctona idea de los grandes Generalisimos en materia de fortalecimiento de companias y sus hazanas se llevan a feliz termino en la nueva etapa mas alta y prosiguio:
					
					El Comandante Supremo formulo la idea directriz del PTC como Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y dirigio con energia a materializar globalmente la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun esta doctrina tomando por base las companias, de manera que se ha abierto la era  de prosperidad para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Formo a los militares como combatientes listos uno contra cien enemigos y condujo con vigor para que todas las companias se conviertan en las filas combativas de acero con la fuerte disciplina, el orden y el aspecto regularizado al administrarlas con escrupulosidad.
					
					En medio de la campana para defender con firmeza y glorificar dicha idea y hazanas de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, se produjo el cambio trascendental en los rasgos ideo-espirituales y la manera de trabajar de los jefes e instructores politicos de las companias y se lograron muchos exitos en el trabajo para estructurar con firmeza las companias.
					
					Hoy en dia, para convertir el EPC en el invencible ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu acelerando con vigor en la nueva etapa mas alta la trasformacion de todo el ejercito segun Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, hay que concentrar de continuo las fuerzas en el fortalecimiento de las companias.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que gracias a la dinamica orientacion y el gran amor del Mariscal, todas las companias del EPC se formaron como filas de defensa a ultranza al lider que comparten el proposito, el sentimiento y el destino con el Comandante Supremo.
					
					Conscientes de que si cuentan solo con el Comandante Supremo, triunfaran sin falta, convertiran todas las companias en las de la defensa a ultranza al lider y la patria, apuntaron.
					
					En la conferencia el Mariscal escucho con atencion las intervenciones de jefes e instructores politicos de las companias y  llamo de cerca a la jefa y la ex instructora politica de la compania Gamnamu (caqui) para tomar foto de recuerdo junto con ellas.
					
					El Mariscal pronuncio el discurso historico en la  conferencia.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos logrados por las companias y labores de los jefes e instructores politicos de las companias que se empenaron por realizarlos y presento las tareas y remedios que se presentan para fortalecer todas las companias como selecto ejercito revolucionario que defienda a riesgo de vida el Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Los jefes e instructores politicos, unidos en torno al CC del PTC, deben superar al frente las pruebas y dificultades y preparar con firmeza a todos los militares de companias en lo ideo-politico y lo tecnico-militar, subrayo.
					
					Resalto la necesidad de establecer en la compania una disciplina ferrea, mejorar su aspecto regular, elevar decisivamente el nivel de mando y administracion de ella y mejorar las condiciones y ambiente de vida de los militares.
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que a traves de la presente conferencia, se pudo buscar a los patriotas y los ameritados desconocidos, que dedicaron todo lo suyo para el fortalecimiento de las companias, y anuncio la decision del CC del PTC de evaluarlos altamente.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae dio lectura al decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El Mariscal otorgo el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC, la medalla de oro (el Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, respectivamente a los jefes de compania Kim Sang Il, Kim Kwang Gum y Sa Song Guk, al instructor politico de compania Pak Son Gi y al comandante de la nave Min Kwang Hae quienes en pleno acato a los legados de los Generalisimos y a la direccion del partido, hicieron especial aporte al fortalecimiento del ejercito popular al convertir las companias en las filas vanguardistas en defensa a ultranza al lider y las capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos y en la casa natal para los militares.
					
					El Comandante Supremo pronuncio el discurso de clausura. 
					
					El senalo que la conferencia se registrara eternamente en la historia de construccion del ejercito del tipo Juche como la reunion en que se preparo el jalon de viraje para fortalecer el ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu comenzando por consolidar la compania bajo la bandera de la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Convencido de que todos los participantes centuplicaran el poderio del ejercito popular y cumpliran su mision en llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun uniendose firmemente en torno al partido, declaro clausurada la conferencia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion conjunta de Banda Moranbong y Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion conjunta de Banda Moranbong y Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presencio la vispera la funcion conjunta de la Banda Moranbong y el Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrecida para los participantes en la 4a conferencia de jefes e instructores politicos de las companias del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Le acompanaron  Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il y otros cuadros directivos de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, los comandantes del EPC y los participantes en el conclave.
					
					Se repercutio el preludio "Cantamos el partido" que encomia en tono alto al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes acumularon las imborrables hazanas ante la epoca y la revolucion levantando en alto la bandera del partido como bandera de todas las victorias.
					
					Se pusieron en la escena la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el coro femenino "Himno a la Patria", la musica instrumental y cancion "Flamea alto, bandera de nuestro Partido", la musica ligera y canciones en serie "Respaldemos con las armas a nuestro Comandante Supremo", el solo femenino y pangchang "Voz de madre", el sexteto femenino "Corramos hacia el futuro" y otras piezas.
					
					Con abundante resonancia solemne de la musica ligera y la orquestal al estilo coreano, los ejecutantes describieron con profunda emocion que se abre el radiante porvenir de la potencia del monte Paektu gracias al Mariscal quien continua con brillantez la causa revolucionaria del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					En el quinteto mixto y coro masculino "Estamos felices en el regazo del Dirigente", la musica ligera "Asi respondieron los soldados", el coro femenino y coro masculino "Defendamos el socialismo" y el coro mixto "Su gran nombre es bandera de victoria" y otras piezas, tambien pusieron de pleno manifiesto el impetu firme de los uniformados y civiles quienes avanzan a todo galope con la nueva velocidad ofensiva del siglo 21 bajo la orientacion del partido.
					
					La funcion termino con los epilogos "Quien se encarga de nuestro destino y futuro" y "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un".
					
					El Mariscal evaluo el exito de la funcion de los ejecutantes y respondio al saludo de los participantes expresando su esperanza y conviccion de que los jefes e instructores politicos de las companias cumpliran con sus deberes en fortalecer el EPC como selecto ejercito revolucionario.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma fotos con jefes e instructores politicos de companias
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma fotos con jefes e instructores politicos de companias
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio la vispera junto con los participantes en la 4a conferencia de jefes e instructores politicos de las companias del EPC.
					Estuvieron presentes alli Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il y otros miembros directivos de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que a traves del presente conclave se preparo un jalon trascendental para el fortalecimiento del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu tomando como su punto de partida la intensificacion de companias con la bandera en alto de la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Felicito calurosamente a todos los participantes quienes terminaron con exito la conferencia con la elevada conciencia politica y fervor revolucionario y tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que conforme al proposito del partido los jefes e instructores politicos de companias cumpliran con su honrosa mision y deber en la labor para fortalecer las companias como selecto ejercito revolucionario y acondicionar bien las companias para que los soldados las consideren como su casa.

articles.title: Entregados a parte surena 6 habitantes surcoreanos
articles.content:
Entregados a parte surena 6 habitantes surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea concedio el dia 25, por via Phanmunjom a la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea la extradicion de los 6 habitantes surcoreanos quienes fueron detenidos al entrar ilegalmente en la RPDC.
					Ellos fueron investigados por el organo correspondiente de la RPDC, que les perdono con magnanimidad en virtud de humanitarismo por haber reconocido y reflexionado francamente de sus crimenes, y decidio devolverlos a la parte surcoreana.

articles.title: Inaugurado Club de Equitacion de Mirim
articles.content:
Inaugurado Club de Equitacion de Mirim
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo levantado en la suburbana zona de Mirim de la ciudad de Pyongyang el Club de Equitacion de Mirim, otra creacion monumental. 
					Esta moderna base esta acondicionada y ambientada perfectamente para el ejercicio y la educacion de equitacion, entre otros, las pistas, las zonas de entrenamiento, la sala de divulgacion de conocimientos, el centro de recuperacion de fatiga, el hospital veterinario y el instituto de reproduccion.
					
					Tuvo lugar este viernes la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok, los funcionarios directivos de las unidades participantes en la construccion, funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, constructores militares, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los de agregados militares y otros miembros de las embajadas en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, pronuncio discurso de la ocasion. 
					
					El orador dijo que el Club de Equitacion de Mirim es una creacion orgullosa de la guia patriotica y abnegada del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y de la heroica lucha de los militares y civiles coreanos fieles a la causa del partido. 
					
					Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok y los funcionarios directivos de las unidades participantes en la obra extendieron la cinta de inauguracion. 
					
					La cortaron los representantes del ejercito, estudiantado, juventud, alumnado de la secundaria vestidos en trajes de jinete.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron varios puntos del club.

articles.title: Yun Won Chol obtiene medalla de oro en Campeonato Militar Mundial de Lucha (M)
articles.content:
Yun Won Chol obtiene medalla de oro en Campeonato Militar Mundial de Lucha (M)
Teheran, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar en Iran el 28o Campeonato Militar Mundial de Lucha (M).
					En este certamen inaugurado el dia 23 participan mas de cien luchadores prevenientes de 18 paises incluyendo Corea, China, Iran, Pakistan y Kazajstan.
					
					En la division de 55kg del estilo grecorromano, Yun vencio al chino por 8:0 al cabo de un minuto 30 segundos del primer tiempo en las eliminatorias, al kazakstano por 6:1 en la primera entrada de los cuartos de final y al pakistani por 7:0 en el primer tiempo de la semifinal.
					
					En la final doblego a su rival irani por 7:0 en la primera entrada poniendo de manifiesto la alta tecnica y el fuerte impetu y obtuvo la medalla de oro. 
					
					El campeonato continua.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun destaca fraternidad y amistad Corea-China
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun destaca fraternidad y amistad Corea-China
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico hoy un articulo individual en homenaje al 63o aniversario de la participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Esta ayuda desinteresada entre hermanos de clase y companeros de armas revolucionarios fue un ejemplo de noble internacionalismo y una expresion de la profunda amistad entre los pueblos coreano y chino.
					
					Asi dijo el articulista y continuo:
					
					En la historia de la amistad Corea-China que se desarrolla cada dia mas, estan grabados los meritos de los oficiales y soldados del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino que combatieron con el heroismo incomparable y el espiritu de sacrificio en el frente coreano bajo la bandera de "Resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios".
					
					En 1950, los oficiales y soldados chinos acudieron al frente coreano para ayudar al pueblo coreano que libraba la batalla de vida o muerte con el imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					Por doquier del territorio coreano, esta latente el noble espiritu de los combatientes chinos que se incorporaron a la guerra coreana entonando la "cancion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino" en respuesta al llamamiento del Presidente Mao Zedong.
					
					El apoyo del pueblo chino en la resistencia antiyanqui demostro que es inquebrantable la amistad entre Corea y China, establecida en las batallas sangrientas para cumplir el noble ideal y la causa.
					
					A pesar de que se observan algunos cambios en las relaciones internacionales en el transcurso de la epoca, se consolida cada dia mas la amistad Corea-China, establecida a base de la fraternidad combativa y confianza de los pueblos de dos paises, bajo la profunda atencion y dinamicas actividades de los Dirigentes de dos paises.
					
					Hacer mas fuerte la raiz historica de la amistad Corea-China y continuar la tradicion de unidad y obligacion moral de compartir la vida y muerte en los tiempos de duras pruebas, esto es la responsabilidad comun y noble mision de los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Sea cual fuere la epoca y suceda lo que suceda en las relaciones internacionales, la RPDC se esforzara en todo lo posible por promover el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China, legadas por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
